The purveyors of justice at the FCC have been " urlLink doing their job ", here's the beef: - Someone claming they are K1AI was most likely telling someone where to shove it on the pig farmer band. FCC raised it eyes, mailed him. He says I ain't go no radio junk, if problem continues, delist me. - WB2JIC might be interfering, broadcasting, and anonying, who knows. Listen to 7.255 for more details. - KC0OAB ran into issues with CW pratice transmission. Hmmm.. - KC2DDD does not appear for retest, gets a no go. Oh well, right? - Joe Mosbergen fired up his 2m handie talkie without a license. Probably cheaper to take the test.

Not sure how many of you are aware of the comments section, but Dave N2NL urlLink posted a good perspective on the reason for lack of JA contest activity under my post a while back. Of course, I cannot speak on what things were like 20, 30, 40 years ago, however ham radio still thrills me. I see a lot of other young'ins hanging in it and playing around. Granted, in the future it might be what it is but nothing lasts forever without changing. Of course, if ham radio dies, I can always migrate over to pirate radio with some pretty good technical knowledge..

We just received the good news that Justin K9MU has been awarded a $2k scholarship via the wonderful people at the Northern CA DX Foundation! This means he will have more money for beer as well as his industrious schooling habit. Next time you see him have him buy you one.
After hiatus we know the sometimes crazy and always polarized QZ is QRV again... And, oh, FD was yesterday/today.

Ok, I'm sure everyone has been waiting on the all new QZ Point/Counterpoint Article. (Well, I'm sure you haven't but I felt like writing in anyway -- keeps people aware that I'm still alive.) For today's posting, I would like to point out how the ultra-lefties are bringing down America faster than Bill Clinton could drop his pants. I'm talking about the ACLU, or American Communist Liberties Union, and their utter disregard of policies that helped found and shape this nation. Today, as I was doing my usual morning routine of eating Cheerios and drinking coffee, I stumbled upon this article (http://www.reclaimamerica.org/PAGES/NEWS/newspage.asp?story=1762) It outraged me...I almost spewed my Cheerios across the room! I couldn't believe what I was reading. It seems as though the ultra-lefty cry babies are at it again. They want all towns across America to remove any symbol of Christ that may appear on their town seal...HOW OUTRAGEOUS! And what baffled me more was, the ACLU took on one of the largest cities in America...Los Angelas AND THEY CAVED IN! This is highly unusual since the ACLU usually picks on small towns that cannot defend themselves in court due to high costs. What has come of this country? Why are we letting the idiots dictate what can and cannot be on our seals, in our schools, on our court houses, and on public property. THIS COUNTRY WAS FOUNDED ON RELIGIOUS FREEDOM, NOT FROM RELIGOUS FREEDOM!!! What can't these moron cry babies understand about that? And they get away with it, WHY? Because the left bent media has everyone in America thinking that we are the problem for everything that has happened bad in the world, and we should feel GUILT that we have caused all of these problems. I don't feel a damn thing! I feel that America IS the best place to live in the world, and I can attest to that since I HAVE BEEN in THIRD WORLD countries where they would give their lives to have half of what our poorest citizens have. You want proof that the United States was founded with religion in mind, take this quote from Benjamin Franklin after the Continental Congress had dead locked on a constitutional proposal, "I have lived, sir, a long time, and the longer I live, the more convincing proofs I see of this truth: GOD governs in the affairs of men. And if a sparrow cannot fall to the ground without his notice (ed. from the Bible Matthew 10) is it probable that an empire can rise without HIS aid? We have been assured, sir, in the Sacred Writings, that "except the Lord build the House, they labor in vain that build it." I firmly believe this...I therefor beg leave to move that henceforth prayers imploring the assistance of heave, and its blessing on our deliberations, be held in this assembly every morning." Want more, Thomas Jefferson who wrote the Declaration of Indepence said, "God who gave us life gave us liberty. And can the liverties of a nation be thought secure when we have removed their only firm basis, a conviction in the minds of the people that these liberties are of the gift of God?...Indeed I tremble for my country when I reflect that God is just; that his justice cannot sleep forever." Want more proof of the cry-baby lefties trying to screw with America. Take the Catholic church issure. Sure, what some of the priests did was wrong, and they should be sent to the elctric chair for their actions. BUT!! BUT!! what did we hear from the Clinton New Network? They TORE APART THE CATHOLIC CHURCH, in essence saying that ALL THE CATHOLICS WERE out to rape young boys. I guess CNN "accidentally" forget to tell us that in America, 13.7 children out of every 1000 are abused in America. (http://www.acf.hhs.gov/programs/cb/publications/cm02/chapterthree.htm) But, when a Muslim, hostage taken aircraft slams into a building, CNN is more concerned about letting you know that all Muslims are not like that, those were just a few of the bad ones, and you shouldn't judge a whole relgion on a few. Want to talk about double standards, it doesn't get any better than this.
KUB urlLink gots himself a moblog , but best of all he has favorites...
Hal, W1NN/7J1AAI's, urlLink looks at JA's contesting decline and recognizes that the same could happen in America. It's worth a read and possibly some thought.

Luc went out on the town Friday night and applied his Latin Lover moves on many LU ladies, here are but a few examples.
Posted a new urlLink about page and also our urlLink viewpoints on urlLink WWYC .

Over the last few days, many have asked me why I have decided to leave the WWYC. There seemed to be a misconception on the WWYC reflector about my decision. Its not that I wanted one person over another to win the vote to become our spokesperson for the CQWW committee; its a much deeper rooted cause than that. Ive noticed over the last several months that some members have taken upon themselves to run other members into the ground, as with most recently, the degradation of LU1FAM by KL9A. Now, on to my leaving explanation When Chris did this to Luc, no one bothered to jump in and let him know that he was wrong to degrade a fellow member. At that moment, it didnt dawn on me, but as timed passed that night, I began to feel more and more rage build up as I thought about it more. Many of you have stated that we are a group of comrades, but I never recall seeing or hearing of a group of comrades allowing one of its members excoriate another member and not say anything about it. Sure, everyone is entitled to an opinion that gives the world flavor, and is what the United States is built on. But, I dont think putting down someone is an opinion, its simply putting down someone. And to do it without that person even being in your presence is one of the lowest down, assholistic things you can do. I will agree with Chris, yes, you are a moron, not something that you should be proud of, but if you are, thats fine; it will get you very far in life. Ive also unsubscribed from the WWYC reflector, but before I left, I took note that many of the remaining WWYC members rallying around KL9A, saying that they agreed with him and his opinions. Again, thats fine; to believe in a persons visions, thats what gives up political parties that decide our worlds fate. But when you begin to rally around someone that blatantly trashes a, as WWYC calls, "comrade", then I choose not to be associated with that in any way. I think that all of the members of WWYC should sit down and think about this, are you accepting an opinion, or are you letting someone think for you? Think about it. Maybe I'm being confusing, but this is how I see the situation before WWYC. As Mark Twain once said, "It's not parts of the Bible I know that scare me, its the ones I dont know that do." 73 Adam AF4QZ

SCDC has decided to pull its endorsement of the World Wide Young Contesters (WWYC). This decision has been reached after some painful interactions with both the membership and the leadership. The current state of WWYC dictates that they go their way and we continue on ours. Our participation was fun while it lasted. We met a lot of people, received some recognition, and we hope, contributed. Luck to everyone still sticking it out.
Our side of the story, urlLink spoken by Chris KL9A himself .

WE4YL.com has moved to a new weblog engine and while the previous posts are still saved they have not been migrated over yet. I'm not sure when this will occur, it could be days or years. For now, relish in the new.

The cq-contest crowd wonders urlLink why are women not contesting . Maybe because 200' towers are very phallic, testosterone is a drug, and it's hard to piss in a bottle when you're a woman.

K1TTT does a cq-sale on cq-contest, urlLink For just $100 you can get the following : 386dx25 5mb ram k1ea dvp card with kenwood cable. Cable re-wired for yaesu radio Heil kenwood mic pigtail. W1wef universal lpt cw interface. Combo Ethernet card with packet driver pctcp with tftp or nettsr networking installed Ms-dos 6.22 CT 9 2 serial ports 1 parallel port 40mb hard drive 5.25" floppy drive keyboard with cover that may or may not fit mono-cga video and monitor Again, that's a 25mhz, 5mb ram, 40mb hd, a 5.25" floppy, mono cga & monitor, dvp, and some pigtails for only $100! Expect these to go dump at a cost to TTT.

I fixed the archive backend on here. Apparently I had a bad directory and it wasn't archiving it, meaning it wasn't hitting Google... All is saved, and it should be okay now. To look at old archives go to the right and select the month you want to view.

This has been the week of WE4YL fans on CQ-Contest it seems... holla 'el hella. Now we got W2AU oping hardcore down at Pappa Johnny Two Tango (PJ2HQ). Nothing like associating with the rich and learning how to work it -- that's what life is about. Our own Colin, KU5B gives a big blah to the affair, the rest of us just wonder how the drinks and the yls were.. Go gettem AU, we'll see you when you're within 4 yeras of drinking age at Dayton.

WWYC boys are doing their thing in 9A, images urlLink here . Find AF4QZ & KE9R with K9YO in the background and win $1 Billion Dollars! We don't especially like them, but WE4YL certainly appreciates a good party...
urlLink TDC & OOO take us around Dayton, show us Fred.
Let's rock! KB1FWN goes SO2R!
Those CQWW boys just released their UBN's to the wild. If you can figure out how to read yours you are a better man and more dedicated to the hobby than I.

For all you handie talkie enthusiasts out there, try urlLink plugging your rig into the local power grid . This shit works for BPL, why not you? AF4QZ has tested this with positive results. He is claiming it might even make Dipoles Over Pig Shit obsolete if trends continue.
On July 4, 2004, our own Greg, KE9R was engaged to his long time love kl. We here at SCDC wish them all the luck in the future. We love ya bro...Good Luck 73 QZ

In this months best TowerTalk post Noel, KD6JHV urlLink explains what happens when you find humans in your back yard. Luckily, KE9R doesn't dig tower holes deeper than 2', which makes finding humans a no issue since it was a corn/soy field before hand. Up and onward friends.
urlLink Go and get it boys , cus who really needs to get the full call anyways?

Sara, K3OOO has a urlLink great article written about her on the ARRL webpage. Sara thinks that many more young people can be attracted to Amateur Radio if it is "perceived as "cool"" rather than a musty old hobby. Yes, yes! Very cool Sara!
IN a KICK ASS FASHION WE4YL shines once again, loading up over 150 qsos! Read the individual accounts: urlLink KE9R urlLink AF4QZ, urlLink KZ9O urlLink K3ASK - Andy! Amazing, or what?
For all of those who get excited over the magical properties of the ether, we now have a urlLink propagation list sponsored by the contesting.com crowd.

Hey dudes, anyone want to join the SCDC NAQP team: "Young Women in Contesting." We've signed up the usual suspects - AF4QZ, K9MU, KE9R, WE4YL, and the mysterious VU5R. OOO, TDC, YO, FAM? 5B is out. 6:15pm edit - Okay, team is AF4QZ, KZ9O (K9MU), KE9R, and WE4YL (who knows?). Go be ladies and show them it isn't just men in contesting!
